review_data.title: fantastic lunch near Schaffhauserplatz

review_data.title: Wonderful small neighborhood place
review_data.content: We were staying in a nearby hotel and decided to try Iberico. The husband and wife owners were very friendly and just attentive enough. I had Langostines and calamari. Very simple and delicious. My wife had a wienerschnitzel that she enjoyed.

review_data.title: The best part of our short stay in Zurich

review_data.title: Multiple visits and the place has never disappointed
review_data.content: Run by an old Portugese couple, the restaurant has fantastic tapas and mains from Spain. Personalized and very friendly service. All the tapas are fantastic, have tried them all during multiple visits and the Mistkratzerli (roasted chicken with herbs) is especially out of the world....More

review_data.title: charming & tasty
review_data.content: small family business with very tasty Spanish/Portugese cuisine. It's a charming place in the unchanged old Swiss Cafe style. Try the Mejillones, the Parrillada and the crema catalana. Excellent value for money!
